data.name: 樱雪集～Yuyuko's Butterfly Dream
data.detailed_description:
Feedbacks

QQ Group:57718025

ABOUT THIS GAME

Yuyuko’s Butterfly Dream is a Platform Action Doujin game originated from Touhou Project with puzzle elements and side-line stories included.
The story is about Yuyuko breaking into a strange new dreamland where she meets Netherworld creatures and mysterious travellers.
In attempts to explore the secrets of this fairyland, searching for its root and a way out, Yuyuko is now on her way for an unknown adventure.

ABOUT FAIRYLAND

Yuyuko, a ghost princess who has departed a thousand years ago, is equipped with the ability to invite one to his death. In a doze, she finds herself in a mystic land filled with scents from Netherworld and its creatures.
Those familiar magic crafts and spells…
And the Death Butterflies surrounding, all recalls the memories sealed for a thousand years…

Game features :

  • Smooth and Simple Action Combats
  • Exciting Boss Encounters
  • Diverse Item System
  • Rich Puzzle Elements
  • Choices-Depending Narratives
  • Multiple Game Ending
  • Touhou Project Roles
  • Classic Japanese Scenes
  • Excellent Music
  • Promising Future Updates

Credits

Touhou Doujin Music Circle, supporter of BGM : Mad Hatter Tea;
Illustration Support : 无感装置、qwer37;
Narratives and Scripts Support: Dim Dawn Luna;
And other friends who participated in making this game.
There wouldn’t be this game without each help. Many Thanks!

The game is now on Early Access, with continuous updates followed:
Improvements for Game Systems and Levels, Support for All Operate Systems(Mac, Linux), Audio on Scripts, Support for English, Japanese and more languages.

data.short_description: Yuyuko,A ghost princess who has been dead for thousands of years, she has superpowers to induce death. In a doze, she is lured to a mysterious place full of the breath of the underworld and creation. And around the dead butterflies, recall a thousand years ago story...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
